definitions.title: n.pr. 1. gent.
definitions.body: (v. Sta:G i. 151 f. Mey:Entstehung 115; cf. Ar. n.pr.fam. qaynun Nab. Sin. n.pr.m. et. f. [[קינו]]; tribe of smiths?);—tribe of Mose’s father-in-law Ju Jdg 4:11 (cf. [[קֵינִי]] Jdg 1:16), Kaina LXXL Kein; akin to Midian (Nu 10:29 P), settled among Amal. In S. of Canaan (v. [[קֵינִי]]); prophesied against by Balaam Nu 24:22 ([[קָָיִן]]; JE);—v. also [[קֵינִי]]

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: [[הַקַּ֫יִן]] in S. Judah (a settlement of II. ´[[ק]]:
?);—Jos 15:57, [Zakan] aeim, A [Zanw] Akeim, LXXL [Zanou] Aken; poss.= Yŭḳîn SE. from Hebron [Rob:BR ii.85] (v. Buhl:Geogr. 162 f. who, however, cp. [[קִינׇה]] v:22).
